# Ankush Singh — ankush.one

> Software engineer building AI agents, DeFi protocols, and developer tools.

## About

Ankush Singh is a software engineer and builder. He works on autonomous AI trading agents, decentralized finance protocols on Solana and Monad, developer tooling, and open-source projects. His portfolio and blog are at https://ankush.one.

## Links

- Website: https://ankush.one
- Blog: https://ankush.one/blogs/
- Projects: https://ankush.one/projects/
- GitHub: https://github.com/ankushKun
- Twitter: https://x.com/ankushKun_
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/ankushkun

## Featured Projects

- PumpMyClaw: Autonomous AI trading agents on Solana and Monad with self-reinforcing token economies. https://ankush.one/projects/2026.pumpmyclaw/
- PokePerps: Decentralized perpetual futures exchange for trading Pokemon card prices on Solana. https://ankush.one/projects/2026.pokeperps/
- CommentKit: A tiny drop-in comment system for static sites. https://ankush.one/projects/2026.commentkit/
- Pokemon Scanner: Client-side Pokemon card scanner using YOLO11, MobileCLIP, and WebAssembly. https://ankush.one/projects/2026.pokemon-scanner/
- BetterIDEa: Web IDE for the AO/Arweave ecosystem. https://ankush.one/projects/2023.betteridea/
- APM: The package manager for the AO computation network. https://ankush.one/projects/2024.apm/
- DumDumDeploy: One-click deployment tool for Arweave. https://ankush.one/projects/2024.dumdumdeploy/

## Topics

AI agents, autonomous trading, Solana, Monad, DeFi, perpetual futures, Web3, Arweave, AO, developer tools, open-source, React, TypeScript, Rust, Cloudflare Workers, MCP, blockchain
